name: Wakin' Waves
description:
This game was coded by Max West, and music design by Cole Christians.  3D models are from Alstra Infinite Boats Low Poly, which can be found here: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/sea/boats-polypack-189866.

W - Forward

A and D turn.  There is no objective to this game,  except zoom around on the boat, and avoid the boulders. The waves get larger as you play.
